page.title: 18SCHOOLS
page.content: { Cowes High School}was built in 1948. It has 1094 pupils aged 13 to 18,a teaching staff of 65 plus Head and provides a full range of subjects to 'A'Level.Cliff Michelmore, the broadcaster, was a past pupil. {Solent Middle School}was opened in 1972,to serve Gurnard, Porchfield, Newtown and part of Cowes. There are 16 teachers and 21 non-teaching staff.The 350 pupils are aged between 9 and 13. {Holy Cross Roman Catholic School}is in East Cowes.It is voluntary aided with a Head, Sister Marguerite and 3 teachers.The 4 acre site is part of the Springhill Estate. The school moved to a room in the Convent in 1950.Rooms were built on in 1952 and 1962.The School began as a Girls Finishing School and is now a Primary School for 105,4to9 year olds.
